# NSSlider.TickMarkPosition.above

**Case**

A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed above the slider.

## Declaration

```swift
case above
```

## Configuring Horizontal Sliders

- **NSSlider.TickMarkPosition.below**: A constant indicating that tick marks are displayed below the slider.
